article: police clashed with demonstrators friday as an angry mob razed the home of a woman suspected of running a prostitution ring that offered teenage girls to government officials and politicians in kashmir 's capital , officials and witnesses said .
abstract: mob razes home of woman who allegedly ran kashmir prostitution ring
